items.headline: Self-Hosted Alternative to Tina Cloud (MVP)
items.content:
Offering a way to self-host the Tina Cloud backend, to avoid vendor lock-in.  \
\
**Status: Research**

items.headline: Drafts
items.content:
Supporting Drafts on a single branch, through a \`draft: true\` frontmatter field.\
\
**Status: In progress**

items.headline: Framework-specific Guides
items.content:
As of 1.0, Tina is framework-agnostic (in CMS-only mode). We need some guides on tina.io for configuring Tina with the most popular frameworks.\
\
**Status: Ready for development**

items.headline: Document Search
items.content:
Document Discoverability can be a challenge as the number of posts grow. We're looking into improving this either by providing our own search, or by supporting external search (e.g through Algolia)\
\
Status: Needs RFC

items.headline: Registering Multiple Forms Per Page
items.content:
The ability to register multiple forms on a page through separate useTina hooks.\
\
**Status: Needs RFC**
